text: It's pretty mean tbh like most employees aren't "choosing" the technologies they use at work. If your boss says "we are using Oracle" guess what, you are using it, lol.

elements.text: It's pretty mean tbh like most employees aren't "choosing" the technologies they use at work. If your boss says "we are using Oracle" guess what, you are using it, lol.

text: I'm surprised with that posting on the image lol. I've never seen someone say, "should not have experience in" lol. But also benefit of the doubt on the posting/employer, is that maybe it can serve as a hint to the applicant that "hey don't bother listing these, show us your other experience that we want to see"

text: Maybe also a way to filter out applications based on those that bothered to adapt their resumes to the job
